Posts.Content: Hi all; We just found out yesterday that the love of my life has "early, low grade" prostate cancer. 2/12 cancerous nodes in the biopsy, gleason score of 6. Because he is "young" (we never thought we'd be young again at 56), the options are confusing me. Survellience seemed like a good option, but I am afraid of it spreading. BTW, I survived breast cancer four years ago. Any similar experiences out there? Advice? Many thanks in advace....
Posts.Title: Young man with confusing options
